newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish baker jailed for food poisoning at school.
newsitem.headline: Polish baker jailed for food poisoning at school.

text.p: A Polish pastry cook was jailed for two years on Monday for causing 140 schoolchildren and teachers to come down with food poisoning, PAP news agency reported.
The municipal court in the north Polish city of Olsztyn also barred the man, named only as Andrzej R., from working as a pastry chef for six years, the agency added.
Two years ago, staff and pupils of an Olsztyn school celebrating Teacher's Day came down with salmonella poisoning after eating cream cakes from the defendant's shop, it reported.
